meanings.definition: To be mutually reliant or dependent on each other.
meanings.sent1: Plants interdepend on sunlight for photosynthesis.
meanings.sent2: In a healthy ecosystem, all living organisms interdepend on each other for survival.
meanings.sent3: The two best friends interdepend on each other for advice and support.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project interdepends on the collaboration of the team members.
meanings.sent5: The delicate balance of nature interdepends on the interactions between different species.
